data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Choluteca, Honduras.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Choluteca, Honduras
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Choluteca to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Choluteca, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Choluteca.
Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Turk people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Turk people.

Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Choluteca, Honduras to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Choluteca, Honduras.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.section_summary:
the state of Choluteca, Honduras has a population of 475,300.

We estimate Choluteca has 130,593 people who might know Jesus, 324,255 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 20,452 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 475,300 people living in Choluteca, Honduras. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.
